ProductInfo.Features:
THL W300: Android 4.2.1 + 1.5GHz MTK6589T Cortex-A7 Quad-core ARMv7 Processor + 2GB RAM + 32GB ROM, 6.5" super large FHD 10-point-touch IPS capacitive touch screen + 1920 x 1080 pixels FHD screen resolution
Up to 1080P FHD resolution for horizontal/vertical auto-switching visual enjoyment Face detection/LED flash/Auto focus camera supports up to 13 MP photo output, Supports 1920 x 1080 pixels FHD camcorder capability
Supports Android Navigation, built-in GPS navigation with A-GPS assisted WiFi + Play Store + Google Maps + One-handed operation + Bluetooth + Ebook + Office + Email + Gmail + Messaging + Wallpapers + Calendar + Calculator + Clock + Alarm + World Clock + Flash Light + Camera + VPN + Tethering & Portable Hotspot
Supports APK format Android game and applications, such as Angry Birds, Tomcat and etc
Works with 3G(WCDMA 850/2100MHz) & 2G networks(GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz)
ProductInfo.Name: THL W300 6.5" FHD IPS Screen MTK6589T 4-Core Android 4.2.1 1.5GHz 3G Smart Phone 13MP CAM (2GB RAM + 32GB ROM) OTG
